column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk Province: At 12:30 AM on August 26
column5: a traffic accident occurred when a black Thundra car with license plate Preah Sihanouk 2A-6220 crashed.------The car hit Chinese man crossing the road
column6: who died at the scene in front of Jinbei 2 in Sihanoukville. The car sped off then collided with two lions roundabout
column7: causing another light pole to break and causing a great shock.------Authorities immediately intervened at the scene and the driver (*appears to be Chinese)  and the car were taken to the Sihanoukville Provincial Road Traffic Office for further legal action. SNTV
